raw_mentions: At 100 mg/kg/day, the dose used for the studies outlined in Figure 1 and throughout this application, free plasma sildenafil concentration was 10.4 ± 5.7 nM, very near the IC50 for the compound.

For in vivo chronic studies, 100 mg/kg/day of sildenafil was used yielding a mean free plasma concentration of 10.4 ± 2.3 nM (IC<sub>50</sub> 5-10 nM).
1.5 g/kg/day of EMD 360527 was used yielding a plasma concentration of 4μM for EMD 360527 (IC50 1 μM in ex vivo vascular rings).

Both compounds have an IC50 of -10 nM for purified PDE5A (vs 1-20 μM for PDEl or PDE3).
